answers.answer: Also - my first urine of the day appears kind of oily.
also I have constant bad breath (vinegar-like). This bad breath worsens if I sleep too much...
in addition, in 2004 I was diagnosed with a benign hepatic hemangioma which I have not checked up on
either you are stumped, holding back, or don't give a crap...

I dont have any answers for you, but just wanted to let you know that I have a similar problem with cloudy urine when I eat the exact same things you mentioned.  I have too have put vinegar in it and it clears right up.  This started suddenly for me as well and I have no idea why.  The only thing different for me is that I am pre-diabetic.  I'm thinking of going to a nephrologist since I've already been to a urologist and he seems stumped.
please keep me informed in what you find out...

question: Thank you for reading this!When I eat fatty foods, like meats, butter, nuts, and oils, these symptoms appear:-Tiredness-Mental confusion-Impaired coordination-Dysphoria-Urgency to urinate-Cloudy urineWhen I eat things like oatmeal and beans (fat free), these symptoms do not appear.Today I tried putting vinegar into my urine and it cleared it up.This health problem started around 8 months ago. Significant dietary/health changes I can think of that may have contributed to this would be abstinence from alcohol (a prior moderate drinker), increased fast food consumption, and frequent over-sleeping.About 2 years ago I ate a lot of sweets and started to develop the signs of diabetes (which was not diagnosed because I haven't been to any doctors). I have had the sugar consumption under control for over a year. This may have contributed to this recent health problem.I really appreciate your advice because I am currently unemployed and do not have health insurance.
title: Cloudy urine/mental confusion/fatigue
